casebody.data:
BARHAM
v.
HAWK, et al. No. 461PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 13, 2005. Kathleen K. Lucchesi, S. Frederick Winiker, III, Charlotte, John D, Kocher, Patricia Wilson Magee, for Hawk & Ear, Nose & Throat. Robert O. Jenkins, Raleigh, E. Hardy Lewis, for Gloria Barham.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of October 2005 by Defendant to Permit Filing of Supplemental Argument:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of October 2005."
